text: Then the temple of God in heaven was opened, and the ark of 11:19 the covenant of the Lord ¦ his covenant Αν BYZ CT TRthe covenant of the Lord was seen in his temple. And there were flashes of lightning, rumblings, peals of 11:19 thunder, ¦ thunder, an earthquake, ANT BYZ CT TRthunder, and great hail.
